title: PDRIMA: A Policy-Driven Runtime Integrity Measurement and Attestation Approach for ARM TrustZone-based TEE
summary: Trusted Execution Environments (TEEs) such as ARM TrustZone are widely used in IoT and embedded devices to protect sensitive code and data. However, most existing defenses focus on secure boot or REE-side monitoring and provide little visibility into the runtime integrity of the TEE. This leaves TrustZone-based devices exposed to persistent TEE compromises.
